scripts.postpublish: (cd ../demo-webon && npm i) && (cd ../ethersjs-nomo-webons && npm i) && (cd ../web3js-nomo-webons && npm i)
scripts.generate_docs: git checkout main && git diff --exit-code && typedoc src/index.ts --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../api-docs/ --exclude **.ts && rm ../api-docs/README.md
